description:
Deforestation in Colombia dropped 36% in 2023, said Environment Minister Susana Muhamad on Tuesday. The number of hectares of tropical forest that were lost through went from 123,517 in 2022…

title: Colombia reduced deforestation by 36% in 2023: government
